article_title: HP chairman Meg Whitman joins Survey Monkey board
article_text:
Thank you for your interest in licensing Fortune content. Please find information on various licensing contacts below and choose the one that best suits your needs:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

3. To license text only photocopies of Fortunearticles as print or digital handouts in academic settings, or in academic coursepacks, please contact the Copyright Clearance Center at www.copyright.com

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Barb Darrow

twitter.description:
For a while there, Bill Veghte was seen as a top runner to become Meg Whitman’s successor as Hewlett-Packard chief executive. But then he left in July to take the top job at SurveyMonkey.
App...
twitter.title: Meg Whitman joins SurveyMonkey board

article_metadata.keywords: hewlett-packard, meg whitman, survey monkey, bill veghte. microsoft, dave goldberg
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Fortune 500, Global 500, Hewlett-Packard, leadership changes, PointCloud, SurveyMonkey
article_metadata.description: Hewlett-Packard chairman Meg Whitman joins Survey Monkey board, reuniting with former HP executive Bill Veghte.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Meg Whitman joins SurveyMonkey board
article_metadata.news_keywords: Hewlett-Packard, Meg Whitman, Survey Monkey, Bill Veghte. Microsoft, Dave Goldberg
article_metadata.sailthru.description: Whitman re-joins former Hewlett-Packard exec Bill Veghte, at Survey Monkey.
